page.title: 07UNEMPLOYMENT
page.content: Since 1980 there has been growing unemployment in the area.This has been due to a number of reasons: 1.Over dependence upon heavy industry and in the steel and tinplate industry in particular.When this industry was hit by recession the area suffered. 2.The general economic climate. 3.Lack of investment in the area.This problem is twofold: (a)lack of public money (b)a shortage of private companies in the area (many of the unemployed have experience in the building industry but although there is shortage of housing in the area there is no available money for construction work) 4.The consequences of the miner's strike:many small businesses depended on the local pits.
